sentences: Bob Woodruff (born in New York City) is an American country music singer and songwriter.

He released four studio albums (1994's Dreams & Saturday Nights, 1997's Desire Road, 2011's The Lost Kerosene Tapes, 1999 and 2013's The Year We Tried to Kill the Pain) and has charted two singles on the Billboard country music charts, as well as a third on the RPM Country Tracks chart in Canada.
His latest album, The Year We Tried To Kill The Pain, was released in Europe in September 2013.
